stats.name: tournamentsPlayed
stats.description: The number of tournaments played by the player.

stats.name: startScore
stats.description: The starting score for the player before the tournament.

stats.name: regScore
stats.description: The player's current score for the entire tournament.

stats.name: scoreToPar
stats.description: The player's current score to par for the entire tournament.

stats.name: driveDistAvg
stats.description: The average yards the player has driven the ball.

stats.name: driveAccuracyPct
stats.description: The percentage of time a tee shot comes to rest in the fairway.

stats.name: gir
stats.description: The percentage of time a player was able to hit the green in regulation.

stats.name: girPoss
stats.description: The possible number of greens in regulation a player is able to hit.

stats.name: puttsGirAvg
stats.description: The average putts the player hit per green in regulation.

stats.name: sandSaves
stats.description: The percentage of sand shots that hit the green and were followed by only one putt to hole out.

stats.name: sandSavesPoss
stats.description: The possible number of times a player could have gotten up and down once in a greenside sand bunker (regardless of score). Note: 'Up and down' indicates it took the player 2 shots or less to put the ball in the hole from that point.

stats.name: eagles
stats.description: The number of times the player shot two (or more) under par for a given hole.

stats.name: birdies
stats.description: The number of times the player shot one under par for a given hole.

stats.name: pars
stats.description: The number of times the player shot par for a given hole.

stats.name: bogeys
stats.description: The number of times the player shot one over par for a given hole.

stats.name: doubles
stats.description: The number of times the player shot two over par for a given hole.

stats.name: doubleBogeysAndWorse
stats.description: The number of times the player shot two or more over par for a given hole.

stats.name: tripleBogeysAndWorse
stats.description: The number of times the player shot three or more over par for a given hole.

stats.name: penalties
stats.description: The number of times the player has gotten a penalty.

stats.name: amount
stats.description: The total amount of money the player has earned.

stats.name: cutsMade
stats.description: The total number of cuts the player has made.

stats.name: consecutiveCuts
stats.description: The total number of consecutive cuts the player has made.

stats.name: officialAmount
stats.description: The official amount of money the player has earned.

stats.name: adjustedScoringAverage
stats.description: The player's adjusted weighted scoring average.

stats.name: adjustment
stats.description: The adjustment used to determine the adjusted scoring average.

stats.name: cupPoints
stats.description: The total points the player has earned in the FedExCup points race.

stats.description: The number of times the player shot par for a given hole.

stats.name: bogeys
stats.description: The number of times the player shot one over par for a given hole.

stats.name: doubles
stats.description: The number of times the player shot two over par for a given hole.

stats.name: doubleBogeysAndWorse
stats.description: The number of times the player shot two or more over par for a given hole.

stats.name: tripleBogeysAndWorse
stats.description: The number of times the player shot three or more over par for a given hole.

stats.name: penalties
stats.description: The number of times the player has gotten a penalty.

stats.name: amount
stats.description: The total amount of money the player has earned.

stats.name: cutsMade
stats.description: The total number of cuts the player has made.

stats.name: consecutiveCuts
stats.description: The total number of consecutive cuts the player has made.

stats.name: officialAmount
stats.description: The official amount of money the player has earned.

stats.name: adjustedScoringAverage
stats.description: The player's adjusted weighted scoring average.

stats.name: adjustment
stats.description: The adjustment used to determine the adjusted scoring average.

stats.name: cupPoints
stats.description: The total points the player has earned in the FedExCup points race.

tournament.displayName: the Memorial Tournament pres. by Workday
tournament.shortDisplayName: the Memorial Tournament pres. by Workday

stats.name: tournamentsPlayed
stats.description: The number of tournaments played by the player.

stats.name: startScore
stats.description: The starting score for the player before the tournament.

stats.name: regScore
stats.description: The player's current score for the entire tournament.

stats.name: scoreToPar
stats.description: The player's current score to par for the entire tournament.

stats.name: driveDistAvg
stats.description: The average yards the player has driven the ball.

stats.name: driveAccuracyPct
stats.description: The percentage of time a tee shot comes to rest in the fairway.

stats.name: gir
stats.description: The percentage of time a player was able to hit the green in regulation.

stats.name: girPoss
stats.description: The possible number of greens in regulation a player is able to hit.

stats.name: puttsGirAvg
stats.description: The average putts the player hit per green in regulation.

stats.name: sandSaves
stats.description: The percentage of sand shots that hit the green and were followed by only one putt to hole out.

stats.name: sandSavesPoss
stats.description: The possible number of times a player could have gotten up and down once in a greenside sand bunker (regardless of score). Note: 'Up and down' indicates it took the player 2 shots or less to put the ball in the hole from that point.

stats.name: eagles
stats.description: The number of times the player shot two (or more) under par for a given hole.
